tasks.title: Accidental Clipboard Paste
tasks.description: Ensure AccessibilityManager.insertText explicitly sets the NSPasteboard.general content to the transcribed text before triggering Cmd+V.

tasks.title: Accessibility Injection Failure
tasks.description: Review TCC permissions and AXUIElement API usage for target applications.

tasks.title: Active Window Context
tasks.description: Capture window titles and bundle IDs to provide context for transcription.

tasks.title: Installer & Permissions
tasks.description: Onboarding flow for Accessibility Permissions and Microphone.

tasks.title: Settings UI
tasks.description: Implement Model selection (Turbo vs Large) and Mic sensitivity sliders.

tasks.title: Long Audio Accuracy Degradation
tasks.description: Implement VAD-based chunked streaming to fix accuracy issues with long recordings.
